title: Bug 23267[Import/Export] Import Project should have a default folder
description: Bug 23267[Import/Export] Import Project should have a default folder
OB: When importing a project, there is no default folder set for selecting the project source.
EB: The software should remember the last folder from which a project was imported and set it as the default folder for future imports.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the software.
2. Go to the Import Project option.
3. Observe that no default folder is selected for choosing the project source.
4. Import a project from a specific folder.
5. Close the software.
6. Open the software again and go to the Import Project option.
7. Expected behavior: The previously used folder should be set as the default folder for selecting the project source.
